thread.title: South Africa ministers sworn in after cabinet reshuffle

title: South Africa ministers sworn in after cabinet reshuffle
text:
South Africa ministers sworn in after cabinet reshuffle 8:27pm GMT - 01:03 
New president Cyril Ramaphosa attended the event vowing to move the country forward. Rough cut (no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
New president Cyril Ramaphosa attended the event vowing to move the country forward.
